availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry T. Harris (Lincoln County, KY attorney)

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, attorney. Hardin County, Kentucky, native. Married to Lucy Jane Craig Harris in Lincoln County on October 22, 1857. Father of Eliza Harris and Margarett Harris. Attorney in Lincoln County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 338.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Stanford, p. 112B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Lincoln County Marriages, Film #, p001904136, p. 94 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "Henry T. Harris (1831-1899)," Memorial #95804164, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/95804164 (accessed November 23, 2018).
